sdata.j: こんなひどい↑目↑↓め↓に↑合↑↓あ↓うより|まだしも|↑死↑↓し↓んだほうがよい。
sdata.e: I would rather die than have such a terrible experience.

sdata.j: この↑方↑↓ほう↓が|まだしも|あれよりよい。
sdata.e: This would be better than that.

sdata.j: ↑数↑↓すう↓↑日↑↓にち↓なら|まだしも|１０↑日↑↓にち↓も↑滞納↑↓たいのう↓している。
sdata.e: A few days would have been excusable, but you are in arrears for 10 days.
